text: Péter Andorai (25 April 1948 – 1 February 2020) was a Hungarian actor. He appeared in over 90 movies beginning 1975. He starred in the 1980 movie Bizalom, which was entered into the 30th Berlin International Film Festival, where it won the Silver Bear for Best Director. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Actors from Budapest
title: Péter Andorai
